about_the_game:
Eternal Legend Supporter Pack


The Ruined Era. Hope is lost. The last of us have ventured underground and supplies are running low. The void has come and it’s looking for our last survivors. The horrors that are coming don’t know mercy, traveler. Steel yourself with the Maw of Madness Portal, Black Sun’s Gaze Back piece, and the Ruined YiQi Collector’s pet.


Maw of Madness

When you stare into the abyss, it tends to stare back. Lock gazes for too long and it’ll invite you into its unfathomable embrace. The call of madness is deafening, and impossible to ignore.

Black Sun’s Gaze

The void’s scrutiny peers beyond the surface. Seeking the dark corners of realms unseen, this abomination acts as your sentry against the inevitable.

Ruined YiQi

The Ruined YiQi is part of Last Epoch’s newest collectible pet series. The YiQi is a fiercely loyal pet who has taken a particular liking to you Traveler, following you not only across Eterra, but on your journey through time as well. Choose your favorite era’s YiQi, or start your quest to collect them all.

150 Epoch Points

So you can purchase further customization options from our cosmetics shop.

*Please note that DLC Packages are not refundable, and if you purchased this DLC in-game, it may not appear in your Steam library. Please check before purchasing to ensure you have not already purchased this DLC.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
